text: Zag or ZAG may refer to: ==Places== *Zag, Kentucky, US *Zag, Mongolia, a district *Zag, Morocco, a town *Zagreb Airport, Croatia IATA airport code ==People== *Zag de Sujurmenza, an astronomer, Spain, 13th c. ==Other uses== *AZGP1 (Zinc-alpha-2-glycoprotein) *Zaghawa language, ISO 639-3 code *Zag numbers, a type of alternating permutation *Zag Industries, acquired by Stanley Black & Decker in 1990 *Zag and the Coloured Beads, UK band *Zig and Zag (Australian performers) *Zig and Zag, puppet duo *Gonzaga Bulldogs, known unofficially as the Zags *TrueCar, Inc., formerly Zag.com ==See also== *Zigzag (disambiguation)
title: Zag
